org.getspout.spoutapi.gui
Interface PopupScreen

All Superinterfaces:
Screen, Widget
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericPopup
public interface PopupScreen
extends Screen

The GenericPopup class creates an mouseable area where you can put multiple Widgets. Optionally the background of the popup can be darkened to make it more obvious that it is a popup.

Method Summary
 boolean close()
          Closes the screen.
 boolean isTransparent()
          Is true if the popup screen has no transparency layer

          Sets the transparency layer
